alert.note: Alert for Atlantic; Atlantic Coastal Cape May; Coastal Atlantic; Coastal Ocean; Ocean; Southeastern Burlington (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 12 at 1:49PM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...AN AREA OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT SOUTHEASTERN ATLANTIC... SOUTHEASTERN OCEAN AND SOUTHEASTERN BURLINGTON COUNTIES... At 148 PM EST, an area of heavy snow was located over Port Republic, or 9 miles north of Atlantic City, moving northeast at 50 mph. Wind gusts up to 50 mph are possible with this area of heavy snow. Locations impacted include... Atlantic City, Ocean City, Barnegat, Pleasantville, Somers Point, Ventnor City, Brigantine, Northfield, Absecon, Margate City, Egg Harbor City, Tuckerton, Estell Manor, Surf City, Port Republic, Longport, Pomona, Mays Landing, English Creek and Bass River State Forest. This includes the following highways... Garden State Parkway between mile markers 29 and 67. Atlantic City Expressway between mile markers 0 and 16. Icy roads are possible as the snow melts on the roads then quickly refreezes. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.
